title: Merry Christmas from the Gas Station, Part 5
itunes:title: Merry Christmas from the Gas Station, Part 5
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Merry Christmas...

***

Written by Gas Station Jack with guest narration by Owen McCuen, Alicia Atkins, Nate Dufort, Megan McDuffee, Steve & Cheryl Blizin, and Bex Carlos

***

For more from Jack check out https://www.amazon.com/dp/173282780X and https://www.amazon.com/dp/1083097288

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
